relevant_findings.tenderness: Tenderness over the greater trochanter of the left femur
relevant_findings.pain: Pain increased with rotation of the left hip

relevant_findings.level_of_alertness: Somnolent; opened eyes in response to loud verbal stimuli
relevant_findings.neurological_response: Executed simple actions on instruction; grimaced to pain
relevant_findings.pupils: Pupils equal, round, reactive to light

relevant_findings.alertness: Opened eyes in response to voice and pain; did not follow commands
relevant_findings.gaze: Slightly deviated to the upper right
relevant_findings.reflexes: Right patellar deep tendon reflex was 3+

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Persistent somnolence and tachycardia observed; neurological examination showed mild changes.
